structure

Class Issue

  • java.lang.Object
    • structure.Issue

  • public class Issue
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the data structure to represent an issue on GitHub.
    Author:
    ZiXian92

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Creates a copy of the given issue.

        public Issue(java.lang.String title,
             int number,
             Repository repo)
        Creates a new issue instance.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the issue.
        number - This issue's number.
        repo - The repository this issue belongs to.

      • Issue

        public Issue(Issue issue)
        Creates a copy of the given issue.
        Parameters:
        issue - The issue to be copied. Cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • makeInstance

        public static Issue makeInstance(org.json.JSONObject obj,
                                 Repository repo)
                          throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates an Issue instance from the given JSON object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The JSON object to be converted to an issue.
        repo - The repository this issue belongs to.
        Returns:
        The issue represented by the given JSON object.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - If an error occurs when parsing JSON data.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Checks whether this issue requires fetching of comments from GitHub.
        Returns:
        True if there exists comments to be fetched and false otherwise.

      • getComment

        public structure.Issue.Comment getComment(int index)
        Gets the comment indexed at the given 1-based index.
        Parameters:
        index - The 1-based index of the comment in this issue's comment list.
        Returns:
        The index-th comment in this issue, or null if the given index is invalid.

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        content - The content of this issue.

      • setAssignee

        public void setAssignee(java.lang.String assignee)
        Sets the assignee for this issue. Pre-condition: The validity of the assignee must be checked with the Repository this Issue is under before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        assignee - The assignee of this issue.

      • setApplicableLabels

        public void setApplicableLabels(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> applicableLabels)
        Sets the list of applicable labels for this issue. Replaces the current list of applicable labels.
        Parameters:
        applicableLabels - The list of applicable labels for this issue.

      • addLabel

        public void addLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Adds the given label to this issue only if the label is applicable to this issue.
        Parameters:
        label - The name of the label to be added to this issue.

      • addComment

        public void addComment(structure.Issue.Comment comment)
        Adds the given comment to this issue.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to add to this issue.

      • addComment

        public void addComment(org.json.JSONObject jsonComment)
                throws org.json.JSONException
        Adds the given comment. Does nothing if the given JSON object is not formatted correctly.
        Parameters:
        jsonComment - The JSON representation of the comment as provided by GitHub API.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - If jsonComment does not contain required keys or values.

      • setComments

        public void setComments(org.json.JSONArray jsonComments)
                 throws org.json.JSONException
        Sets the comments for this issue..
        Parameters:
        jsonComments - The JSON array representation of the comments for this issue as provided by GitHub API.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - If an error occurs while parsing jsonComments.

      • setComments

        public void setComments(java.util.ArrayList<structure.Issue.Comment> comments)
        Sets the comments for this issue.
        Parameters:
        comments - The comments for this issue. Cannot be null.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Sets the status of this issue.
        Parameters:
        status - The status of this issue. Should only be Constants.ISSUE_STATUSOPEN or Constants.ISSUE_STATUSCLOSED.

      • setIsInitialized

        public void setIsInitialized(boolean isInitialized)
        Marks this issue as initialized or uninitialized.
        Parameters:
        isInitialized - True if data should not be fetched by Model for this issue and false otherwise.

      • setRepository

        public void setRepository(Repository repo)
        Sets the repository this issue belongs to.
        Parameters:
        repo - The repository that this issue belongs to.

      • setMilestone

        public void setMilestone(java.lang.String milestone)
        Sets the milestone for this issue.
        Parameters:
        milestone - The name of the milestone for this issue. Can be null but not an empty string.
